body.name: YILQQPER Dresser for Bedroom with 5 Drawers, White Dresser for Closet, Living Room, TV Stand, Nursery, Chest of Drawers with Sturdy Steel Frame, Leather Finish, Wood Top (Glacier White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 8 hrs 54 mins.
features: 🌼5 DRAWERS DRESSER FOR BEDROOM: The size of the dresser organizer is 39.4'' W x 11.8'' D x 23.8'' H. It doesn't take up too much space but provide more storage possibilities for nursery, closet, living room, hallway, dorm and office. Especially perfect as a TV stand. This glacier white dresser is a very nice piece of furniture to make your home more dramatic.

👚EXTRA STORAGE : This wide dresser come with 5 drawers. each drawer is about 1 cubic foot and deep enough for organizing lingerie, blankets, underwear as well as clothes and toys of your kids. Wood top provides hard surface for 45'' TV, displaying vase, lamps, books, ps5 station, and can also be used as any flexible extra storage.

🏋STURDY AND DURABLE: Made of strong steel frame and thick wooden top, this dressers offers stable support and ensures years of use. Non-woven fabric with faux leather front bins are easy to clean and open and close quitely. All in all, this dresser it's a reliable part of your bedroom furniture.

🏡MAKE LIFE BETTER: The bins pull out easily so you can just carry the contents to and fro without disassembling the dresser drawer or carrying the dresser all the way. 5 independent drawers can store daily necessities by category, and never need to look for things from a pile of things. 4 adjustable feet protect your floor from scratches.

💖EASY ASSEMBLY: This closet organizers and storage is easy to assemble with hardware included, Assemble video have been uploaded on this page for guidance. Please don't miss the step showing curved part of bar, be sure all curved ends need to be on one side. Let us know if any needs. Your satisfaction is always our priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks Great & Sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Super impressed with this. It was incredibly easy to assemble. All the screws & do-jiggies came in one long sealed, separated & labelled plastic pack. Each different piece had a letter assigned & printed on the plastic pack & then that letter was clearly indicated in the diagram of the instructions. I was able to put it together stress-free! It is really sturdy. I don't have kids so i don't feel the need to attach it to the wall. It is not made for heavy items in any event. The leatherette fronts & gold handles really make the item look great. It is really good quality, well made & sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick delivery, packaged well, easy assembly...
reviews.reviewText: Quick delivery, packaged well, parts are labeled, easy assembly and light to carry upstairs and sturdy to hold some weighted items. Happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little chest of drawers is SO easy to put together and perfect for lighter things. I put pjs and tank tops in mine and it’s great for little spaces !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is really a good deal god you buck. I can appreciate that. I bough 5 of these for ultimate storage for a medium sized room. The results are amazing. Something quick, simple and cute. Sleek appearance and holds items well. Very sturdy and light weight. I’ve had them for 6 months so far and they are still very legit. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent! If you order more than one, beware!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this and there was a defect so I had to go through the trouble of figuring out a return, which would be fine if it was an item of casual carrying weight.Because it was the perfect measurement with a good size drawer for the space I needed it for I got a replacement delivered.There were missing screws but at that point it was simpler to get screws than do another return. I decided to order another one to organize another area, and that one was missing different screws than the previous unit. To top it off it doesn’t seem level.Oh and I almost forgot, on the second go around, (when I received the replacement) there were imperfections such as tears on the interiors of two drawers.On the additional (third) unit, there’s a big imperfection on the outside of one drawer and one on the inside of another drawer.This is very much you get what you pay for vibes. It works, if you’re putting it somewhere out of site like a closet, its very doable.It does the job. The drawers are decently deep and wide, the handles are sturdy and the drawers seem sturdy enough.If you’re looking for something sans headache and actually checked for quality assurance I recommend finding something else!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and cute dresser
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, light, and looks more expensive than it is!Using it as a small dresser in my bedroom. I recommend reading the instructions carefully to make sure the hinges align so that the drawers go in easily. It's also a little bit on the shorter side (not like a typical dresser) so make sure to read the measurements. I love it and highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Defected Items, however, seller made it up.
reviews.reviewText: When I first got the item, I assembled it and the items was broken in places and it was defected. The width of the legs were completely off. There were no way to place the top board on without drilling new holes, so I repackaged it and returned it. Didn't want to bother with getting replacement parts. I sent it back and seller reached out to me. Told him I've sent it back, however, he insisted that he will send me one for the trouble out of his pocket. I told him it wasn't necessary, but he insisted. It came, and the box was a little damaged, not as bad as the first time.This time the product was in good shape and everything fitted as it should. The product works fine, and I really appreciate Jaden for reaching out and offered this dresser. Product is good, customer service is top notch.Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sizes not accurate at all WARNING!
reviews.reviewText: We order these to go next to our bed as dresser/nightstands. Our bed sets up super high, we have a bed frame that is 20” off the ground for storage, a foster and stearns extra firm mattress and a 6 inch topper. This dresser size stated would have been perfect as a night stand, however it is not accurate at all. We were very disappointed in size. We account for mis measurement by 1-2 inches but we ordered two and both are the exact same height and not near the manufacturers measurements listed.The draws are nice and it would be a great dresser if the measurements weren’t so off. We would have ordered different ones to accommodate the height.
